title: I Got Better
lyrics: A reflection on healing after heartbreak — saying he’s changed, not fully healed.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Last Night
lyrics: A messy late-night conversation where two people can't fully walk away from each other.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Wasted on You
lyrics: He realizes he spent too much time, love, and effort on someone who didn’t stay.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Sand in My Boots
lyrics: A nostalgic memory of meeting someone on vacation and wishing it could’ve been real.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Thought You Should Know
lyrics: A heartfelt message to his mom, telling her he’s trying to live better.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: You Proof
lyrics: He searches for something strong enough to numb the pain of missing someone.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

lyrics: He keeps staring at a phone number tied to a person he can’t forget.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: 7 Summers
lyrics: Looking back on a relationship that should’ve lasted longer than it did.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Cowgirls
lyrics: A fun, rowdy track about wild girls who live like cowboys.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3

title: Everything I Love
lyrics: He tries to move on, but everything reminds him of the person he lost.
mp3: ./songs/Morgan Wallen - I Got Better (Official Music Video).mp3
